main.description: Verifies control over a phone number with a code received via SMS and starts a contact import session. Requires authentication.

phone.description: The phone number to verify. Should be the same as the one passed to `app.bsky.contact.startPhoneVerification`.

code.description: The code received via SMS as a result of the call to `app.bsky.contact.startPhoneVerification`.

token.description: JWT to be used in a call to `app.bsky.contact.importContacts`. It is only valid for a single call.
